Line moving from center to top-left (other quadrants mirrored)

Examples:
At t=0:    518,518-518,518 (center)
At t=518:  000,518-518,000 (diagonal across quadrant)
At t=1036: 000,000-000,000 (top-left)

Equation:
y=1036-x-t

Time:
t=1036-x-y

First number is upper-left quadrant; others are mirrors from other quadrants
00 17 82 99
01 16 83 98
04 13 86 95
05 12 87 94
08 09 90 91
02 19 80 97
03 18 81 96
06 15 84 93
07 14 85 92
10 11 88 89
20 37 62 79
21 36 63 78
24 33 66 75
25 32 67 74
28 29 70 71
22 39 60 77
23 38 61 76
26 35 64 73
27 34 65 72
30 31 68 69
40 57 42 59
41 56 43 58
44 53 46 55
45 52 47 54
48 49 50 51
